attributes.action: save the digital radio station BBC 6Music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The digital radio station BBC 6Music is a beacon of good musical taste, wit and culture. It has integrity. Save BBC Radio 6Music!

rejection.details: The BCC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
